General.Name: Aoshikang Technology Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Aoshikang Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of printed circuit boards in Asia, Europe, and the Americas. The company offers high-density interconnection laminates, multilayer flexible boards, rigid-flex printed circuit boards, and packaged carrier boards. Its products are used in automotive, computing and storage, tele-communications, industrial and instrumentation, and other sectors. The company was formerly known as Aoshikang Technology (Yiyang) Co., Ltd. Aoshikang Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

1.Name: Mr. Zi Xiu  He
1.Title: Deputy GM, CFO, Sec. of the Board of Directors & Non Independent Director
